title: Bethlehem Reverend Delivers ‘Christ in the Rubble’ Christmas Sermon Amid Gaza Conflict
description: “If Jesus were to be born today, he would be born under the rubble in Gaza,” Palestinian Christian Rev. Dr. Munther Isaac said.

title: U.K. Home Secretary James Cleverly Apologizes For Making Joke About Date Rape Drug
description: James Cleverly came under fire for joking about date rape just hours after announcing plans to crack down on the “perverse” offense.

title: The Enduring Lesson of Langston Hughes’ Christmas in Uzbekistan
description: Invited by Soviets to Uzbekistan, Hughes found unexpected warmth in a community of African American agronomists.

title: ‘Targeted’ Florida Mall Shooting Leaves One Man Dead and a Woman Injured
description: A man died in a shooting at a shopping mall in central Florida, in which the victim was “targeted” for the attack, police said.

title: Network Sitcom Bucket List: 7 Decades of Great Comedies to Stream Over the Holidays
description: Seven decades of great comedies you can stream now, from 'I Love Lucy' to 'Abbott Elementary'

title: Why I Still Believe in Santa Claus
description: The Santa of our collective memory transcends the space of chimney and childhood.
